Normal Version[/u][/b]

 i just used the female sultry voice type and added the vampire faction so she should talk like vampire when she attacks 


[u]Dawnguard Version Requirement

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800]XP32 Maximum Skeleton [/url][/u]

uses the dlcvampirefemale voice type as there not much dialogue to use to make her voiced but least her chat idles and combat and detection are voiced 



[u]Location[/u]

near river wood bridge [/center]

[b][u][center]Recommended mod 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71869]Female Sultry Follower Voice Fix[/url][/center][/u][/b]
